card.name: Ash Covenant
card.text: Create a Yokai Token Unit with 2 Max HP, it has: “Enemy Characters can’t be healed”

card.name: Barrier
card.text: Target Character gains barrier for 12 turns.

card.name: Beg the Wise Quondam
card.text: Create a Yokai Token Unit with 1 Max HP, it has: “You draw 1 aditional card at the beginning of each turn.”

card.name: Bring the Pester
card.text: Create a Yokai Token Unit with 1 Max HP, it has: “Your opponents draw 1 card less at the beginning of each of his/her turns. This can’t reduce their draws to less than 3.”

card.name: Chronostasis
card.text: Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.) Choose one: -Target Character loses his/her next turn. -Add 12 Shifts to target suspended Action.

card.name: Conflagration
card.text:
Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Deals (Magic) damage to every enemy Unit.

card.name: Dark Lightning
card.text:
Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit, Put a Dark counter on it.

card.name: Dark Spell
card.text:
Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Deals (Half Magic) Damage to target Character, then that Character loses that much mana.

card.name: Divination
card.text:
Look at the top (5 + X) cards of your library, then return them in any order. (X cant be 0)
You may play an additional Action this turn.

card.name: Engulfing Dreams
card.text:
Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Target Unit gains sleep for 12 turns.

card.name: Flame Coil
card.text:
You may play Flame Coil as an additional Action if you played a Fire Action card this turn.
Flame Coil deals 2 damage to target Unit.

card.name: Fogs of War
card.text: Flip 1 coin for each Enemy character. Each character that got X coins won gains blind for (triple X) turns.

card.name: Harmonize
card.text: Remove all abnormal status from every Character.

card.name: Healing Burst
card.text: Each Character you control heals an amount equal to its Magic.

card.name: Healing magic
card.text: Target character heals (Magic).

card.name: Holy Beam
card.text:
Suspend 3 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with three Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Deals (Magic) Damage to target Unit.
If you didnt play Holy Beam from your hand, resolve it instantly instead of suspending it.

card.name: Impudent Summoning
card.text: Remove from the game 2 Summoner Action cards chosen at random from your discard pile, then you may copy of each them once.

card.name: Invite the Spectre
card.text: Create a Yokai Token Unit with 1 Max HP, it has: “At the beginning of each shift step every enemy Character loses 1 mana”

card.name: Invoke Ancestors
card.text: Create a Ancestor Token Unit with 1 Max HP, it has: “Reduce all damage dealt to Characters you control by 2.”

card.name: Life’s Embrace
card.text:
You may Flip 0 coins instead of paying Nature’s Embrace mana cost. If you do and lose the coin cancel it.
Prevent all damage that would by dealt to target unit for 6 turns.

card.name: Meteorite
card.text: Suspend 6 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with six Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.) Deals (Magic) damage to every enemy Unit.

card.name: Plead for the Kirin
card.text: Create a Spirit Token Unit with 1 Max HP, it has: “At the beginning of each shift step remove all abnormal status from every Character you control.”

card.name: Polymorph
card.text: Suspend 4 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with four Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.) Target Unit gains frog for 12 turns.

card.name: Purification
card.text: Remove all abnormal status from target Character.

card.name: Raise
card.text:
Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Revive target Character, healing it by half of its Max HP.

card.name: Reflex
card.text: Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.) Target Character gains reflex for 12 turns.

card.name: Reraise
card.text: Target Unit gains reraise for 12 turns.

card.name: Sanctuary
card.text: Flip 1 coin for each Enemy character. Each character that got X coins won gains silence for (triple X) turns.

card.name: Sorcery Aid
card.text: Choose a Character. The next time that character plays an Action with mana cost, copy it.

card.name: Sorcery of Death
card.text:
Suspend 3 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with three Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Put a Dark Counter on Active Unit.
Flip 4 coins + an additional coin for each Dark counter on Active Unit. If you get 4 or more coins won, target Unit dies.

card.name: Sorcery of Flames
card.text:
Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit.

card.name: Sorcery of Ice
card.text:
Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit.

card.name: Sorcery of Thunders
card.text:
Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.)
Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit.

card.name: Soul Canibalism
card.text: Target Character gains: “Whenever this Unit is dealt damage, it heals half of that amount to the Active Unit.” until it dies unless it already has it.

card.name: Summon Needle
card.text: Create a Yokai Token Unit with 1 Max HP, it has: “At the beginning of each shift step deals 1 damage to every enemy Character”

card.name: Summoner’s Dwell
card.text: For each Token Unit you control, create a copy of it.

card.name: Thoughts as Desserts
card.text: For 6 turns, the Shaman recovers all mana spent by target Character. that Character loses (Half Magic) mana.

card.name: Time-Space Disturbance
card.text:
Switch turn orders between two Characters owned by the same Player.
You may play an aditional Action this turn.

card.name: Vortex
card.text: Suspend 2 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with two Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.) Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit.

card.name: Walk with the Time
card.text: Suspend 3 (When you play this card from your hand,remove it with three Shift counters on it. At the beginning of the next Shift step, remove a Shift counter. When the last is removed, resolve the card.) Target Character takes an aditional turn.

card.name: Water Spoils
card.text:
You may play Water Spoils as an additional Action if you played a Water Action card this turn.
Target unit heals 2.

card.name: Welfare Spirits
card.text: Create a Spirit Token Unit with 1 Max HP, it has: “At the beginning of each shift step heal 1 to every Character you control.”

card.name: Ad nauseam
card.text: Remove from the game target Utility, Equipment or Counterplay card. It’s owner adds 3 basic actions called Defensive Stance from outside of the game to his/her library.

card.name: Alive Grass
card.text: Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit. Flip 3 coins. Then if you get 3 o more coins won, that Unit loses his/her next turn.

card.name: Antidote
card.text: Removes Poison from target Character.

card.name: Antique Runes Arquebus
card.text: Whenever the attached Unit deals damage to a character, its owner removes the top card of its library. Melee Actions played with the attached Unit are now Ranged.

card.name: Arrow Rain
card.text:
Requires Bow attached to the Active unit.
Deals (Half Power) damage to every enemy Unit.

card.name: Art of War
card.text: Remove target Equipment from the game.

card.name: Basic Attack
card.text: Deals (Power) damage to target Unit.

card.name: Berserker’s Adze
card.text:
Damage dealt by Melee Actions played with the attached Unit is increased by 4.
Whenever the attached Unit plays a Melee Action, flip a coin. If you lose all coins, cancel that Action.

card.name: Censor the Historics
card.text: Remove up to 3 cards from target player’s discard pile.

card.name: Charm Spell
card.text:
Reveal the top 6 cards from your library. Target Unit gains charmed for 3 turns for each Thief Card revealed this way.
Charm and Conquer may target Units from the opposite sex than the Active Unit only.

card.name: Cheapshot Revolver
card.text: Whenever the attached Unit plays an Action, it deals 1 damage to target Unit.

card.name: Chirijiraden, the Wicked
card.text:
Whenever Chirijiraden, the Wicked comes into play, it deals 1 damage to target Unit.
Whenever attached Unit plays a Melee Action flip a coin, If you lose discard Chirijiraden, the Wicked.

card.name: Cobble Proyectile
card.text: Deals (Half Power) damage to target Unit.

card.name: Combat Dirk
card.text:
Melee actions played with the attached Unit deals additional 1 damage.
You may attach up to 2 Daggers to the attached Unit

card.name: Concentrated to the Soul
card.text:
Requires Bow attached to the Active unit.
Flip 3 coins, for each coin won, it deals (Half Power) Damage to target Unit. If all coins are missed, it deals (Half power) damage instead. This damage can’t be prevented.

card.name: Corito’s Barrier
card.text: The Lancer gains barrier for 12 turns.

card.name: Corrupted Journal
card.text: You may discard Corrupted Journal during your Action step as long as its still attached to a Character you control. if you do, target player puts the top 2 cards of its library on its discard pile.

card.name: Crushing Blow
card.text:
Remove any number of Equipments attached to any Character you control.
Deals damage (Half power) for each removed equipment to target Character.

card.name: Dash
card.text:
Deals (Power) damage to target Unit. This damage can’t be prevented.
Can’t be canceled.

card.name: Defensive Stance
card.text: Incoming damage is halved for 6 turns.

card.name: Demonic Knife
card.text: Deals (Magic) damage to every enemy Character.

card.name: Diplomatics
card.text: Flip a Coin, if you win enemy Counterplay cards can’t be triggered for 12 turns.

card.name: Draconic Hex
card.text:
Target Character gains: “Whenever this Unit is dealt damage, receives additional damage (Half Magic) for each Hex counter on it.” unless it arealdy has it.
Put a Hex counter on that Character.

card.name: Earth’s Blow
card.text: Deals (Power -2) damage for each card called Earth’s Blow in your discard pile to target Unit.

card.name: Enforced Decree
card.text: Next time an Action is played with target Character, its owner chooses one: -You search his/her library for a card, then remove that card and the Action card played from the game. Then he/she Shuffles his/her library. -Remove the top 4 cards from the top of that Player’s library from the game.

card.name: Essence’s Kiss
card.text: Removes Frog from target Character.

card.name: Ether Cup
card.text: Target Character recovers (Double Magic) mana.

card.name: Evha’s Curse
card.text:
Poison deals 1 additional damage to enemy Characters.
Dealing damage with a Melee Action played with the attached Unit causes Poison on the Character that was dealt damage this way.

card.name: Eye Cleaning Drop
card.text: Removes Blind from target Character.

card.name: Field Support
card.text:
Search in your library for an Equipment card and put it into play attached to target Character. Then Shuffle your library.
You may play Field Support as an additional Action if you played Basic Attack this turn.

card.name: Focus
card.text: Increase target character’s Power by 1.

card.name: From Piercing to Shredding
card.text:
Target Character gains: “Whenever this Unit is dealt damage, receives additional damage (Half Power) for each Shred counter on it.” unless it arealdy has it.
Put a Shred counter on that Character.

card.name: Gale Slit
card.text: Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit. Flip 2 coins. Then if you get 1 coin won remove target Equipment from the game. If you get 3 o more coins won Gale Slit deals (Magic) damage to that Unit.

card.name: Go for the eyes
card.text: Target Character gains blind.

card.name: Gorgon’s Dust
card.text: Removes Petrified from target Character.

card.name: Grace Rain
card.text: Characters you control heals (Magic).

card.name: Grand Trick of the Hidden Fork
card.text:
Deals damage (Power) to target unit.
Whenever a Melee action played with a Thief or Squire deals damage, you may discard Trick of the Hidden Fork from your hand, If you do, it deals 2 damage to target Unit.

card.name: Hallowed Scepter
card.text:
If attached Unit would deal damage with melee actions, it heals that amount instead.
Attached Unit’s Power is increased by 2.

card.name: Healing Potion
card.text: Target Character heals (Double Magic).

card.name: Igneous Will
card.text: Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit. Flip 2 coins. Then if you get 1 coin won, River Stream deals (Magic) damage to that Unit. If you get 3 o more coins won, that Unit gains sleep for 12 turns.

card.name: Judgment
card.text:
You may discard a Knight Action card from your hand, if you do return Judgment from your discard pile to your hand.
Deals (Power) damage to target Unit.

card.name: Looter’s Cunning
card.text:
Remove target Counterplay card from the game.
If you control 1 Utility or more, target Character gains poison.

card.name: Lucky-runed Dagger
card.text: Whenever you would flip a coin, you may remove Lucky-runed Dagger. if you do, you may flip an additional coin.

card.name: Mace of Faith
card.text: Attached Unit’s Magic is increased by 1. Damage dealt by magical Actions to the attached unit is reduced by 1.

card.name: Magma Flows
card.text:
Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit.
Flip 3 coins. Then if you get 4 or more coin wons, that Unit dies.

card.name: Makeshift Explosive
card.text: You may remove Makeshift Explosive from the game during your Action step, if you do it deals 1 damage to 4 Units at random.

card.name: Militar Mastery
card.text:
Militar Mastery can’t trigger Counterplay cards.
Remove target Counter card from the game.

card.name: Modern Musket
card.text:
Damage dealt by Ranged Actions played with the attached Unit can’t be reduced.
Melee Actions played with the attached Unit are now Ranged.

card.name: Multiple Slash
card.text: Deals (Half Power) damage to every enemy Character and up to one enemy Invocation.

card.name: Mutilate
card.text: Reduce target Unit’s max life by (Half Power). If the Unit is already hurt, then it deals aditional (Half Power) damage.

card.name: Needle Trick
card.text:
Target Character gains poison.
Draw a card.
You may discard an equipment card from your hand, if you do you can play an additional action this turn.

card.name: Osafune, The Hungry
card.text: Whenever Osafune, The Hungry comes into play, target Character loses 1 mana. whevener a character is dealt damage with Melee Actions played with the attached Unit, it loses 2 mana.

card.name: Osafune’s Cry
card.text:
Requires Osafune, The Hungry attached to the Active Unit.
Deals 1 damage to every enemy Character, then every character that was dealt damage this way loses (Magic) mana.

card.name: Piercing Crossbow
card.text:
Damage dealt by Ranged Actions played with the attached Unit is decresed by 2, but it can’t be prevented.
Basic Attack cards played with attached Unit are now Ranged Actions instead of Melee.

card.name: Repeated Strike
card.text: Flip 4 coins, for each coin won Repeated Strike deals (Half Power) damage to target Unit.

card.name: Restore
card.text: Remove all abnormal status from target Character.

card.name: Restriction by law
card.text: Search Target player’s library for up to 1 card and remove it from the game. Then that players adds 3 basic actions called Defensive Stance from outside of the game to his/her library. Then that player Shuffles his/her library.

card.name: Revive
card.text: Revive target Character, healing it an amount equal to the double of its Magic

card.name: River Stream
card.text: Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit. Flip 2 coins. Then if you get 1 coin won, River Stream deals (Magic) damage to that Unit. If you get 3 o more coins won, that Unit gains frog for 12 turns.

card.name: Rod of Eternity
card.text: Whenever the attached Unit plays a Support or Magical Action, put a Eternity Counter on Rod of Eternity, then it recovers mana equal to the half of the amount of Eternity Counters on Rod of Eternity.

card.name: The Rod of Tomorrow
card.text:
At the beginning of attached Unit equipment step, draw a card.
During your Action step, you may remove The Rod of Tomorrow from the game. If you do draw a card.

card.name: Sabotage
card.text: Look at the top 10 cards of target player’s library, then you may remove up to 3 cards from there from the game. Then that player shuffles his/her library.

card.name: Sculpt
card.text:
Deals (Magic) damage to target Unit.
Flip 3 coins. Then if you get 2 coins or more won, Sculpt deals (Magic) damage to that Unit. If you get 4 o more coins won, that Unit gains petrified.

card.name: Shout of Chirijiraden
card.text:
Requires Chirijiraden, the Wicked attached to the Active Unit.
Deals (Magic) damage to every enemy Character for each Dagger Attached to the Active Unit. then discard all Chirijiraden, the Wicked Attached to the Active Unit.

card.name: Spiked Gear
card.text:
Reveal the top 8 cards from your library, for each Defensive Stance revealed this way Spiked Gear deals 1 damage to target unit. This damage can’t be prevented or redirected.
Can’t be canceled.

card.name: Spirit Rod
card.text: Attached Unit’s Magic is increased by 1. Damage dealt by Magical Actions played with the attached Unit is increased by 1.

card.name: Spirit Test
card.text: Deals (Magic) damage to target Character, then reduce it’s Max mana by half of that amount.

card.name: Strengh of Will
card.text: Active Unit gains (Half Power) Max HP. If the Active Unit is not hurt, you may play an additional Support Action this turn.

card.name: Strike Mind
card.text: Reduce target character’s Magic by 1.

card.name: Strike Twice
card.text:
Deals (Half Power) damage to target unit.
Deals (Half Power) damage to target unit.

card.name: Study of Mastery
card.text: You may Copy any Action card removed from the game and play it without paying it’s mana cost. Remove Study of Mastery from the game.

card.name: Swep Strike
card.text: Deals (Half Power) damage to every enemy Character and up to one Token.

card.name: Task bag
card.text:
You may attached up to 2 equipments to the attached Unit as long as only 1 of them is a Bag.
During your Action step, you may remove task bag from the game. If you do, search your library for an actionc ard that shares type with the attached Unit.

card.name: Teach the Excel
card.text: Search your library for an Action that shares type with the Active Unit then play it. If you do, remove it and Teach the Excel from the game when it resolves. Then Shuffle your library.

card.name: Teras Bow
card.text:
Damage dealt by Ranged Actions played with the attached Unit is increased by 2.
Melee Actions played with the attached Unit are now Ranged.

card.name: Treacherous Blow
card.text:
If you control a Thief, you may play this card as it was the Active Unit. If you do, switch turns between Active Unit and that Thief, the Thief becomes the Active Unit for the rest of this turn.
Deals (Power) Damage to target Unit.

card.name: Valheim’s Militar Sword
card.text: Attached Unit’s Power is increased by 2.

card.name: Valheim’s Reach of the war
card.text:
Attached Unit’s Power is increased by 1.
Melee actions played with the attached Unit wont trigger counterplay cards as Melee.

card.name: Valheim’s Shield
card.text: Damage dealt by Melee or Ranged Actions to the attached Unit are reduced by 2

card.name: Venemous Edge
card.text: Deals (Half Power) damage to target Unit, it gains poison.

card.name: Vitality Recover
card.text: Target Character heals an amount equal to its Power. Then it recovers an amount of mana equal to its Magic.

card.name: Weak Spot
card.text:
Suspend Weak Spot undefinitely. At the beginning of each Shift step flip 3 coins, for each coin lost put a Charge counter on Weak Spot, then if Weak Spot has 6 charge counters or more resolve it.
Deals (Half power) damage to target unit for each charge counter on Weak Spot.

card.name: Wild Sparks
card.text:
You may play Wild Sparks as an additional Action if you played a Water Action card this turn.
Target unit recovers 1 Mana.

card.name: Wind wave
card.text: Deals 6 damage to target Unit.

card.name: Wit’s Bane
card.text: Whenever a Unit spends mana, Wit’s Bane deals 2 damage to it.

card.name: Absolute Mastery
card.text:
Trigger: The Geomage is being targeted by a Magical Action.
Flip 2 coins, If you get 2 coins won you gain control of the triggering Action. You may choose new targets for it.

card.name: Autopotion
card.text:
Trigger: Any damage dealt to the Chemist by an Action.
The Chemist heals (Double Magic).

card.name: By Law Or By Force
card.text:
Trigger: Any damage dealt to the mediator by any source other than Actions.
You may copy any Counterplay card other than By Law Or By Force that has been removed from the game without meeting its Trigger condition.

card.name: Consequences
card.text:
Trigger: After the Chronomage received Damage by a Melee or Support Action.
Target Counterplay or Equipment attached to the Active Unit is discarded from play.

card.name: Consume Own Thoughts
card.text:
Trigger: After the Warlock receives any amount of damage by a single source.
You may remove X Action cards from your discard pile, if you do the Warlock heals (half X). Add to your deck (Half X) cards called Defensive Stance from outside of the game and Shuffle your library.

card.name: Counter attack
card.text:
Trigger: After the Monk receives damage from a Melee Action.
Deals damage (Power) to the Active Unit.

card.name: Counter Magic
card.text:
Trigger: After the Warlock receives damage from a Magical Action.
Reveal the top 5 cards from your library, you may play a Warlock Action among the revealed cards without paying it’s mana cost. Shuffle your library.

card.name: Dawn of Glory
card.text:
Trigger: Any damage dealt to any Character you control.
Target Character heals (Magic).

card.name: Disrupting Decree
card.text:
Trigger: A Support Action is played.
Cancel the triggering Action unless his/her controller removes the top 3 cards of his/her library.

card.name: Emergency Quick
card.text:
Trigger: The Chronomage entering Critical State after receiving any damage.
The Chronomage takes an additional turn after this one.

card.name: Fallen’s Aid
card.text: Trigger: Any damage dealt to the Shaman by any source other than Actions. Attach an equipment card from the discard pile to the Shaman.

card.name: interception shot
card.text:
Trigger: A Ranged Action is played.
Cancel triggering Action.

card.name: Javelin Harpoon
card.text:
Trigger: The Lancer is being targeted by Support or Ranged Action.
Discard an Equipment attached to the Lancer. If you do, Javelin Harpoon deals 2 damage to the Active Unit.

card.name: Mana Feast
card.text: Trigger: An enemy spent mana. The Shaman recovers an amount of mana equal to the triggering mana spent.

card.name: Martial Artist
card.text:
Trigger: The Monk is being targeted by Basic Attack.
Deals damage (Power) to the Active Unit.

card.name: Must Insist
card.text:
Trigger: The Lancer entering Critical State after receiving any damage.
The Lancer gains reraise for 12 turns.

card.name: Plea
card.text: Trigger: Any damage dealt to the Priest by a Magical Action. Reveal the top 10 cards from your library, you may play a Priest Action among the revealed cards without paying it’s mana cost. Shuffle your library.

card.name: Power Surge
card.text:
Trigger: After the Geomage is dealt damage by a Melee or Ranged Action.
Flip a coin, if you win the Flip increase the geomage’s Power by 1.

card.name: Quicker Hands
card.text:
Trigger: The Thief is being targeted by Melee Action.
Take control of an Equipment attached to the Active Unit and attach it to the Thief.

card.name: Safeguard
card.text:
Trigger: Ranged or Melee Action is targeting a Character you control other than the Knight.
The knight receives all the damage that triggering action would do instead of its original target.

card.name: Sharp Gasp
card.text: Trigger: The Samurai is being targeted by a Melee Action. Cancel the triggering Action, then flip a coin. If you win the flip, you may set Sharp Gasp on the Samurai instead of putting it into the discard pile.

card.name: Smoke Curtain
card.text:
Trigger: The Archer is being targeted by Ranged Action
Active Units owner flips a coin. If he/she loses the flip, cancel the action.

card.name: Soul and Body Balance
card.text:
Trigger: Before the Summoner receives any damage from a single source.
Instead of receiving any damage from the triggering source, the Summoner loses that amount of mana.

card.name: Sudden Summon
card.text:
Trigger: After the Summoner receives damage from a Magical Action
Reveal the top 8 cards from your library, you may play a Summoner Action among the revealed cards without paying it’s mana cost. Shuffle your library.

card.name: Superior Defense
card.text:
Trigger: After The Knight receives any amount of damage by a single source.
Look at the top 5 cards of your library, you may remove a card called Defensive Stance, if you do, the Knight heals (Half Power).

card.name: Tackle
card.text:
Trigger: The Squire is being targeted by a Melee Action.
Deals (Half Power) damage to the Active Unit. This damage can’t be prevented and this action can’t be canceled after triggered.

card.name: Through Flesh and Bone
card.text: Trigger: The Samurai is deal damage by a Magic or Ranged Action. Flip a Coin, if you win the flip, the Samurai deals an amount damage to the Active Unit equal to the samurai’s missing HP.

card.name: Timelines Manipulation
card.text:
Trigger: After The Chronomage received any amount of damage by a single source.
Choose up to X cards from a single discard pile and put them on the bottom of its owner library, where X is the amount of triggering damage.

card.name: Warzone Study
card.text:
Trigger: Any damage dealt to the Chemist.
Look at the top 3 cards of each library, then you may put any of them in the bottom of their owner’s library, then return the rest in any order.

card.name: Youthful’s trap
card.text:
Trigger: The thief is being targeted by Ranged Action.
The Active Unit gains poison. If the active Unit already had Poison, Youthful’s Trap deals (Half Power) damage to it.

card.name: Spiritual Cannibalism
card.text: At the end of each of the attached Unit’s turns, you may sacrifice an Invocation Token you control. If you do, the attached unit recovers (Magic) mana and increase target Invocation Token you control Max HP by 1.

card.name: Treasure Hunter
card.text:
At the beginning of attached Unit’s Action step draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.
Whenever an enemy Character enters Critical State, you may take control of an Equipment owned by an opponent. If you do, attach it to the attached Unit and remove Treasure Hunter from the game.

card.name: Affinity for War
card.text:
Attached Unit can equip Spear.
During attached Unit’s Equip step, you may remove Affinity for War from the (the: Attach to target step, you may remove Affinity for War from you control. Equip only as a sorcery.) game. If you do, choose 2 cards that were removed from the game and Shuffle them in your library. Then draw 1 card, then discard a card.

card.name: Battle Formation
card.text:
Damage dealt to the attached Unit by Ranged and Melee Actions is reduced by 1.
At the beginning of the Counterplay step draw 1 card, then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Bishop’s Autorithy
card.text:
Attached Unit can equip Scepter.
At the beginning of attached Unit’s Equip step you may search your library for a Scepter Equipment card and put is aside, suffle your library then put that card on top of it (it: Attach to target step you may search your library for a Scepter Equipment card and put is aside, suffle your library then put that card on top of you control. Equip only as a sorcery.).

card.name: Browbeat Diplomat
card.text: Attached Unit can equip Gun. Whenever a card owned by an opponent is removed from the game, if the attached Unit has a Gun equipment attached to it, you may sacrifice Browbeat Diplomat. If you do, attached Unit deals 1 damage to target Unit.

card.name: Extreme Rapture
card.text: Whenever attached Unit would deal an amount of damage by a Melee Action, you may flip 2 coins. if you get 2 or more coins won double that amount and remove Extreme Rapture from the game.

card.name: Infinite Insight
card.text:
You may look at the top of each player’s library.
During your Counterplay step, you may remove Seer’s wisdom from the game. If you do, each player shuffles it’s library.

card.name: Maintenance
card.text: Equipments you control cant be destroyed, removed from the game or taken control by your opponents. You may play Utility and Equipment cards on any Unit you control during your turns.

card.name: Muscle Enhacement
card.text: Melee damage dealt by the attached Unit is increased by 2.

card.name: Overwhelming Runes
card.text:
Magical damage dealt by the attached Unit is increased by 3.
Whenever the attached Unit deals damage, it deals 1 damage to itself.
Draw 1 card less at the beginning of the attached Unit’s turn.

card.name: Path of Dedication
card.text: Attached Unit heals 3 at the end of each of its turns.

card.name: Primal Skills
card.text:
Attached Unit can equip Axe.
During attached Unit’s Action step, you may remove Primal Skills from the game. If you do, the next time you would Flip a coin due to an Axe hability, you Flip an additional Coin.

card.name: Strategy In Deep
card.text:
At the beginning of attached Unit’s turn, you may search your library for a card and remove it from the game.
During attached Unit’s Equip step, if the attached Unit is (is: Attach to target step, if the attached Unit you control. Equip only as a sorcery.) in Critical State, you may sacrifice Strategy In Deep. If you do, search your library for a card and put it on top of your library.

card.name: Time Transgressor
card.text: Whenever attached Unit plays an Action with Suspend, lower the Suspend value by 1.

card.name: Toxic Tossing
card.text:
You may attach Toxic Tossing to an enemy Character as you paly it. If you do, its owner takes control of Toxic Tossing.
Attached Unit can’t activate Counterplay cards. Whenever attached Unit is dealt damage by a Melee Action, it deals 1 damage to the Active Unit.

card.name: Trascend
card.text: Attached Unit recovers 2 mana at the end of each of its turns.

card.name: Weapon Guard
card.text:
Attached Unit can equip Shield.
During attached Unit’s Equip step, you may discard an equipment attached to the (the: Attach to target step, you may discard an equipment attached to you control. Equip only as a sorcery.) attached Unit. If you do, seach your library for a Shield Equipment and attach it to the attached Unit.
